abstract: Sony is announcing a new L.C.D. television that is ultra-thin and does a much better job of handling fast-moving images.
snippet: Sony is announcing a new L.C.D. television that is ultra-thin and does a much better job of handling fast-moving images.
lead_paragraph: (UPDATED 9/4: Correcting references to megahertz. Refresh rates are measured in hertz.)

headline.main: Sony Ups the Ante on L.C.D. TVs
